Name: Golden Crown
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 10 Stars

Name: Treasure Hoard
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 15 Stars

Name: Triumph
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 20 Stars

Name: Rainbow Jewel
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 4 Rainbow cards

Name: Specialist
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 5 of the same Color (all revealed)

Name: Risky Venture
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 5 Red (2 Bluff)
Reward: 4 VP,  if caught, discard and lose -1VP instead

Name: Universal Exchange
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 1 of each Color + 1 Stars (1 Bluff)

Name: Economic Supremacy
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Be the richest and have at least 3 more Stars than the 2nd richest player. Cost: all of your extra stars

Name: Card Collector
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Have 7 cards in hand

Name: Empty Hands
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Have 0 cards in hand at the start of your turn. Cost 4 Stars.
Reward: 3 VP. Permanently increase drawn cards by 1.

Name: Stacked Influence
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Have at least 4 BM Stacks

Name: Criminal Empire
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Have at least 4 CR Stacks

Name: Duality
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Have at least 3 BM Stacks AND 3 CR Stacks

Name: Ultimate villain
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Be Mastermind with 5+ CR Stacks. Free.

Name: Corporate Lord
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Be CEO with 5+ BM Stacks. Free.

Name: Unicorn’s Heart (Red)
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 2 Rainbow + 3 Stars

Name: Unicorn’s Horn (White)
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Have 7 cards in hand or more. 5 Stars.

Name: Unicorn’s Wings (Rainbow)
Cost/Requirement: Cost: 1 of each Color (not Rainbow)

Name: Unicorn’s Tail (Yellow)
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Have at least 3 more Stars than the 2nd richest player. Cost all of your extra stars

Name: Unicorn’s Mane (Blue)
Cost/Requirement: Have 5 or more Permanent Cards Active

Name: Great Council
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Be both CEO and Mastermind simultaneously. Free

Name: Purity
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: You must have no Secret Cards nor Illegal cards.

Name: Mastermind Bonus
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Be the Mastermind and richest

Name: Hostile Takeover
Reward: 3 VP and retrieve any card from discard pile

Name: Master or both worlds
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Be both a MasterMind and a CEO. Free.

Name: Consolation Prize
Cost/Requirement: Requirement: Have the least VP at the start of your turn (no ties). Cost: 3 Stars.
